showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ at great prices. Friendly and helpful staff. You have both diesel and gasoline with lots of snacks if you're on the run. Large parking  area if you're staying for a while. A  clean shower is waiting for you if you want to wash you're frame.

One older lady always tells my fiance and I we leave a mess when dinner in the shower We don't leave any towels or wash clothes on the floor We always put our things in the hamper!! Charging for two shower when we use it at the same time ‚Ä¶
Very nice place. Shower is great at the end of a long day
Good food, nice and clean shower. Perfect stop

showerReviews.reviewText: What an awesome truck stop! Clean bathrooms & showers! (The towels in shower pik were ours) & laundry area. Great  restaurant! Clean, stocked & organized store. Lots of souvenirs & gifts. They make their own fudge right there & it‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Im fluffy, so I thought the shower stall itself was kind of small, BUT, it was one of THE CLEANEST showers Ive ever had on the road, and $8(!!!!!). The HOT water and water pressure were also on point. Ill be back for sure!
Great little truck stop. Absolutely spotless and well mannered staff. Definitely some of the most well prepared food on the road.  If you can believe it- $ 5 dollar shower  üöø ‚Ä¶
You can also wash here for free if you buy 50 gallons of diesel fuel. And if you buy a shower ticket for 8 dollars, it is inexpensive, for example, at other gas stations it costs 15 dollars.

OTR drives, plenty of parking.
Large lot.
Shower are AMbest
Cash 8$
Restaurant onsite
üëçüëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶
Nice truck parking, nice shower, old lady behind counter could use some customer service skills. Has post office and restaurant. Truck Wash was ok, not great. Mexican restaurant was good.

Ok place . Friendly people.. restaurant good.. showers old small and showerhead hangs almost at 5ft height. So for me at 6ft2 I have to shower on my knees..
Parking is ok

I am a female trainee. Walked in with my trainer he asked for a team shower.  The cashier gives us one. When he said something. She stated " what's the problem I gave you the big one"  problem is he is my trainer. So today I s hi powered ‚Ä¶
Pretty decent food. Clean place. Friendly girls at register. Shower was clean and cheap @ $8.00. Thank you!!
This is a great place to eat ,shower, fuel ,and Wi-Fi

showerReviews.reviewText: Honestly after seeing some negative comments on the showers, we were hesitant to stop at this location. Thankfully, we had a great experience! While the truck parking was completely full, we did get to snag a temporary parking area to come ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ NO HOT WATER IN SHOWERS ‚Ä¶

04-09-25
The store is in the process of renovating. New showers. Unfortunately, the cheap shower heads spoil so much efforts of renovating them.
Beaten up driveways. Outdated pump equipment, but always friendly customer service! ü§† ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a Love‚Äôs. Parking here can fill quickly. I usually park across the road at the road ranger and walk over to Love‚Äôs to use my free showers. There‚Äôs a sidewalk that connects the truck stops. It gets me a bit of exercise to walk briskly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of loves workers are just lazy and that's sad because the bathrooms look updated. I come into my shower nothing but hair on the sink floor and toilet. It doesn't even require much to just wipe and sanitize things for the next person. ‚Ä¶

HOT SHOWER!! I stopped at Loves #345 store to fuel, and the pump didn't work. I left there and came to this one, and everything was great. I'm not sure how there can be such a difference between different stores within the same chain

‚Ä¶ are my favorite travel stop when I'm out on the road I can get everything I need here including a hot shower propane clean windows with windshield washer fluid available and the folks here are so nice so kind and very hospitable love ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Diamond status every month. Loves is the only truckstop I fuel at. Pulled into this one today to get a quick shower and grab something to eat before I fuel and hit the road. I parked across from the cat scale in an open spot between 2 ‚Ä¶
Worst shower experience I‚Äôve ever had at a love I didn‚Äôt get to enjoy my shower it was barely warm to take a shower literally no hot water don‚Äôt ask for shower 4

Friendly Staff, Clean Showers, Fuel Pumps were clean & not busy, and parking was not a problem. I arrived 03/30/18 at 1915 and was parked & in my shower by 1930. The employees and the managers were all friendly and greeted me and they were ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Quick stop while traveling through Wisconsin. The Osseo Family Restaurant that‚Äôs connected looked pretty good. Prices looked reasonable. Restrooms were clean. Didn‚Äôt need a shower, but what a great amenity for truck drivers and travelers.

Very nice shower facilities.  If I had to guess, I'd say the showers received a recent face-lift. Very clean and smelled good too. There were paper towels in the shower room! They also provided 2 bath-sized towels, 1 hand towel,  1 ‚Ä¶

The convenience store was nice and clean. Showers were a different story. Human waste streaks in the toilet. Curly hairs on the shower seat and the toilet lid. Hair dryer didn't work, even after resetting the ground fault. The shower door ‚Ä¶

Staff is top tier, shower freshly remodeled, and CLEAN. Food is also good. They have a good variety of snacks and fresh fruit bowls that were FRESH. It‚Äôs hard to come by a good helpful staff, and clean establishment out here in the truck ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ nothing to them at all. It is totally sad. Thank God I received a little money to take a shower and sustain it until tomorrow. Truckers and people in general in this area are not what you truly think they are!!!! A place to stay away from! ‚Ä¶
Very clean place,great stuff in the store,family restaurant(very very delicious food )big parking for semi clean shower.A+++++

‚Ä¶ Amazing home cooked food in the restaurant! Clean restrooms and I'm sure showers are nice too although we didn't use them.  Plenty of semi parking although the lot is not paved and has some potholes.  We will definitely be coming back! ‚Ä¶
Great place to stop! Friendly staff and clean facility. The food and the staff at the sit down restaurant were great. Great place for truckers to stop for a bathroom break, shower or a hot meal!
Amazing food in the restaurant! Pretty cool truck stop nice and tidy restrooms. The shower definitely needs a better cleaning procedure but wasn't "really" bad.
Store was clean and had lots of options for snacks. Shower was outdated but decently clean. The restaurant attached was good, food was great and the atmosphere was nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . All in all days work! But if you come here after one of those days 2 hours before they close asking to purchase a shower, expect to be told no. Apparently, they use the shower rooms as restrooms while they clean the actual restrooms. The ‚Ä¶

I was pretty surprised with this place. Nice and clean.  Lots of parking for trucks. Good food and the cheapest shower if you are not fueling (75 gallons  minimum).
Will stop again.

Clean restrooms
Shower
Restaurant
Big parking lot
Free parking

Honest people. Left my watch in the shower. Could have easily kept it and said they didn't find it. They had it at the counter for me when I came back. Good people are still out there.

Thanks from
One happy vet..
Cashier refused to let me get a shower. His excuse was because they close soon, and tgey sold too many showers today. Its only 8pm, they close at 10pm.
Went there to get a shower and a couple of items.....got turned down for wanting a shower at 8pm.....well I'm never coming back to this place.....it used to be one of my favorite stops

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Had a friend just stopped wanted to take a shower and eat. 2 ladies behind the counter told him  it be a hour or longer for the showers to be cleaned. There was only 2 other trucks in the whole parking lot.  What bs

Great place to stop and get something to eat or take a shower.
Showers are 5.00 and parking lot has plenty of parking. Restaurant has great food and the staff is friendly.
I'll be back..

Went in to try to get a shower, story about one of their showers is out of order, no sign on that door, another about they have a customer in there from last night, other assorted b.s. left. Parking lot is large as mentioned b4. Some food ‚Ä¶
Nice truckstop. Wont find a nicer $5 shower. Good food in resturaunt and large selection of local smoked meats and cheese. Think i gained 10lbs in 34hrs
Beautiful and clean, big shower rooms only $5 ( if you don't fuel, they only have 3 tho)
Great out of knowhere place.passed by in route to loaded.i came back took clean shower n great breakfast üç≥. would tell everyone about this gem in woods ‚Ä¶
Liked everything. Liked the shower, the dinner in the restaurant, and staff was great!

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would ‚Ä¶

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this ‚Ä¶

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn‚Äôt clean at all and from the looks of it hasn‚Äôt been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn‚Äôt cleaning them, ‚Ä¶

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles ‚Ä¶
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* ‚Ä¶
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

After a hot day of unloading FD the shower was heaven, great water pressure. I gave them four starts because there is no toilet in the shower room, it was cold when I went into the room, and though it was clean could use an update.  Don't ‚Ä¶
Nice people good food selection.. shower's subway... good sized parking lot... What else do you need.
